title: Cap Streamer, 1690s
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cap streamer with a symmetrical pattern of balanced floral and foliated forms. Pattern connected by brides picotées, outlined by cordonnet and interspersed by portes and gaze quadrillée. Decorated with fleurs volantes (flying flowers). Often referred to as Rosaline lace.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Streamer, 1690s.
1690s. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-161.
